name: Yonder Star
description: A distress call from a heavily damaged Romulan shuttle reveals a human escaping Romulan captivity. Protect him from the Romulans!
rules:
— In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
— There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
— Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of TOS Spock, Chapel, Keras, Garth, Kirk, McCoy, Scotty, Chekov, Uhura, Rand, Sulu, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
— Using the Enterprise 1701-A, Romulan Warbird, or Miranda Class ship will provide a bonus to hull.
— Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Spock (TOS), Chapel, Keras, Garth, TOS Bridge Crew

rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Captain, we heard a distress call, found this lone human aboard a damaged Romulan shuttlecraft, and beamed him directly to sick bay. Oh, look, the patient is awake! You're safe, sir. You're aboard the USS Enterprise. Do you remember anything before you lost consciousness?"
"My name is Altor. I'm a priest. I was looking for Eden, the storied garden of creation. I was captured by the Romulans, and escaped. I must continue my search. It is of vital importance!"

"Fascinating. The Enterprise once encountered a group -- the crew of a ship called the Aurora -- who was also looking for Eden. We never knew whether they found it... Nurse, the ship has gone to Red Alert. Altor, it looks as though the Romulans have followed you."

"USS Enterprise, we have you at our mercy. I am Commander Keras. You have an escaped prisoner of ours, who stole one of our shuttles. Return him to us immediately, and there will be no consequences. Fail to return him, and the results will be...unfortunate."

"Captain, we heard a distress call, found this lone human aboard a damaged Romulan shuttlecraft, and beamed him directly to sick bay. Oh, look, the patient is awake! You're safe, sir. You're aboard the USS Enterprise. Do you remember anything before you lost consciousness?"
"My name is Altor. I'm a priest. I was looking for Eden, the storied garden of creation. I was captured by the Romulans, and escaped. I must continue my search. It is of vital importance!"

"Fascinating. The Enterprise once encountered a group -- the crew of a ship called the Aurora -- who was also looking for Eden. We never knew whether they found it... Nurse, the ship has gone to Red Alert. Altor, it looks as though the Romulans have followed you."

"USS Enterprise, we have you at our mercy. I am Commander Keras. You have an escaped prisoner of ours, who stole one of our shuttles. Return him to us immediately, and there will be no consequences. Fail to return him, and the results will be...unfortunate."
